title: Problem 2041_E
statement: Image generated by ChatGPT 4o. A-Ming's birthday is coming and his friend A-May decided to give him an integer array as a present. A-Ming has two favorite numbers a and b, and he thinks an array is beautiful if its mean is exactly a and its median is exactly b. Please help A-May find a beautiful array so her gift can impress A-Ming.The mean of an array is its sum divided by its length. For example, the mean of array [3, -1, 5, 5] is 12 \div 4 = 3.The median of an array is its middle element afte
